### Overview

This project was developed as part of the AD688 course at Boston University. Our team (Group 6) focused on analyzing current job market trends to provide data-driven insights into salary, job requirements, and career planning.

The main research question:  
**How do salary and compensation trends differ across roles, regions, and job types in 2024?**


### Skills Used

- **Tools**: Python, Pandas, Power BI, Quarto
- **Topics**: Data visualization, salary analytics, career strategy
- **Roles**: Team collaboration, writing, web presentation
